physical_examinations.vital_signs: Normal serum TSH level (1.6 mU/liter; reference 0.5–5.0), normal free T4 level (0.9 ng/dl; reference 0.9–1.8), slightly high Tg level (31 ng/ml; reference Not specified).
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Presence of a thyroid nodule (15-18 mm hypoechogenic solid nodule in the mid right lobe) and multiple thyroid adenomas.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Ultrasonography at age 40 years showed three nodules in the left lobe along with scattered hypoechogenic foci in the thyroid parenchyma.
